name: The BMI Calculator
description: | Programmed and tested with: JavaScript, Cypress | This simple yet fully functional little calculator app was my first challenge as a student going through developer bootcamp. I love to look at it from time to time just to get a sense of how much I've grown.

name: The Address Book
description: | Programmed and tested with: JavaScript, Cypress | A pretty little app and another one of my throw-backs to the beginning of my developer career. This simple little app lets you add and edit contacts to your online address book, there are of course lots more to be added.

name: The Little Newsroom
description: | Programmed and tested with: Ruby on Rails, Rspec | This was my very first time working with Legacy code. This was initially an old blog where I was tasked with going through and debugging so that we finally could add features like read and edit articles.

name: The Little Massage Parlor
description: | Created with Wix | A talented woman came to me asking for a website that she, a masseuse with no marketing skills, could easily maintain. I recommended I build her a website in Wix, which is an easy click- and drag platform for small and medium sized businesses. So proud of the outcome!

name: The Little Ranch
description: | Created with Wix | On a huge feild somewhere in the middle of sweden is a ranch owned by the coolest family. They sell horses and they love people but they do not love marketing. I felt compelled to give them a beautiful little ranch-website and they sold me a horse as a thank you. Pure love!

name: The Little Booth
description: | Created with Adobe Illustrator and Indesign | The big tech fair was coming up and they had already baught this huge, empty white booth with nothing to fill it with. I made roll ups, posters, flyers, business cards and folders. They said it was the fanciest they'd ever looked and I agree!
